title: CableJive dockBoss: Instantly upgrade your audio dock. Connect iPhone or Android smartphones and tablets to a pre-iPhone 5 audio dock. Compatible with Bose SoundDock, iHome, JBL, and many other popular audio docks.
description: Upgrade your audio dock. dockBoss is a smart cable that connects any Apple or Android smartphone or tablet to any SoundDock, iHome, or other speaker dock system. To start playing your music, simply plug the CableJive end into your speaker dock, and the audio cable into your Android, Blackberry or Windows phone, tablet, or laptop. Done.How does it work? dockBoss translates the audio signal through a standard audio plug to the speakers. With 2.5 ft. of cable, you can hold your device in your hand while it is connected to your sound system. Be the boss of your dock.Note:The dockBoss is compatible with all speaker docks and many car iPod systems. Not currently compatible with Volkswagon factory installed iPod/iPhone integration kits.All products purchased from CableJive include our warranty. If there is anything wrong with your product, please contact our service department. We're happy to help.
